item.title: SimPy Garment Factory - Simulation in Python

item.description: How many people and vehicles cross the US-Canada and US-Mexico land borders each month?

item.title: Chinook Database - Using SQL to Answer Business Questions
item.description: We are a fictional online record store. We want to use information from our database to answer business questions and inform strategic decisions.
